Name: Palo Alto PAN-OS
Author: Eli Forbes - v-eliforbes@microsoft.com
Description: [PAN‑OS](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/pan-os.html) is the software that runs all Palo Alto Networks next-generation firewalls. By leveraging the key technologies that are built into PAN‑OS natively -- App‑ID, Content‑ID, Device-ID, and User‑ID -- you can have complete visibility and control of the applications in use across all users and devices in all locations all the time.
